title: Promo bug ?
body: i reached the Plat 4 promo 5 times for now .. and i lost them all .. the first 3 promos i losed the 2 games in row so i thought that's why i don't get a free win .. the 4th one i won a match out of 3 and i got a msg for a free win .. the 5th one i won a match and i thought i already got to plat 4 and guess what i didn't get my free win i continued my promo and lost it ... now it's the 6th promo with no free win again idk why .. i lost the first match of the promo and won the second and still didn't get to plat 4 !! what the hell is that.. someone help me plz i can't stay like that forever

replies.body: what you got to do is stop getting carried by team and carry your games so you wont have fail promos 5 Times a Row in the Platipus elo.

Once you've hit the Plat level, I'm afraid you won't be getting anymore promo helpers. It's designed to help players keep ranking up even if they have one really bad game. Once you're in Plat however, you should be able to rank up based on skill. Be sure to check up on how [**promo helper**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h2q3) works, along with any other ranked play questions you might have.
